title: Track a Driver's Location
description: A customer is asking for a real-time update on the location of the truck carrying their shipment.

tasks.description: Find the load associated with the customer's order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the correct load and the driver assigned to it.

tasks.description: Query the truck's ELD/GPS system for its current location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns the truck's current location on a map.

tasks.description: Share a secure, temporary tracking link with the customer so they can see the truck's location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer receives a link to a live tracking map.
